channel.title: Tnt
channel.description:
Right so, TNT is now enabled but for staff members only right now. We need to work out some form of criteria for who gets to use TNT.
Right now, only staff members can place it BUT anyone can detonate it meaning you don't go leaving stock piles of it laying around :P
The general feeling is that it shouldn't be allowed in PVP because not everybody has it. I'll post this here first to get some suggestions for critera and a system that should be implemented to choose who gets TNT permissions.
My idea is this: It works like the nomination system, except people can request they be reviewed for TNT permissions.
Thoughts?

item.title: Tnt
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

About current applicants:

http://www.moparcraft.net/worldmap/8923toaeu.log

Firstly, I’ll eliminate those who don’t meet the requirements: Cole1497 (Krackid apparently doesn’t want it). I wouldn’t give Cole access anyhow.

Aside from that I only have one concern, that being StubernSnake, I have a feeling he can’t be trusted with TNT. I wouldn’t be able to sleep at night so as far as I’m concerned thats a very big no from me. He lives with four people anyway, so I have a feeling they’re going to try and use TNT smartly to do damage - I won’t even go down that road.

While he doesn’t have much of a record, he isn’t very stable and gets really pissy. I generally push him around when it comes to PVP and I have a feeling there wont be much left of my house the next time I log on. As for kaim3tsu, I’ve seen him on like once I think we should wait a little longer for him.

Apart from those two I’m fine with everybody else (that being: Fuscate. EnderLove). Opinions?

Read full topic

item.title: Tnt
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

‘for a’? it’s not ‘by a’?

Either way, I’ll search for slain or shot.

edit:
nope:

$ cat ~/complete_server.log ~/ram-disk/one/server.log | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | egrep "was (slain|shot)" 2011-10-06 12:41:36 [info] [2]<davidi2> one day, the mum of the pigs was slain by a blocky adventurer 2011-10-13 15:55:41 [info] [2]<badger41> agentmoose was slain by zombie 2011-10-13 19:00:18 [info] [2]<badger41> inb4 bool was slain by penismaster 2011-10-22 13:00:35 [info] [2]<tarkoff> he was slain 2011-10-23 20:28:05 [info] [2]<maximealian14> im so glad i saw something that didnt start with moosycat was slain by 2011-11-12 18:03:13 [info] [1]<ryosukej> you killed him twice + i never saw kaim3tsu was slain by crazysmile22 2011-12-12 17:38:49 [info] [player_command] magma828: /me was slain by pig 2011-12-12 17:42:49 [info] [player_command] magma828: /r was slain by triston001's fork 2011-12-28 20:58:36 [info] [1]<fuscate> inb4 triston was shot by a skeleton 2012-02-13 09:02:58 [info] [2]<cursedkhan> it says i was shot by herobrine 2012-02-13 10:21:38 [info] [player_command] cursedkhan: /r i was shot by herobrine 2012-02-18 22:17:58 [info] [2]<xbanz> i was slain by spidar just now 2012-02-20 18:07:06 [info] [2]<agl1431> inb4 stubernsnake was shot by tom5001 2012-02-25 22:57:16 [info] [1]<badger41> inb4 thebest1 was slain by ender dragon

Read full topic

@moparisthebest wrote:

I went ahead and added everyone to that group besides kracky alright? As for the name change issue, I can make a formal post in announcements telling people to post there when they change their in-game name if you want.

Group looks right, they should message me BEFORE they change their name if they are planning to. Otherwise the name will be up for grabs with TNT power.

Hopefully xAuth will be out soon though and it’ll never be an issue, he is working hard on it:
https://github.com/CypherX/xAuth/issues/28#issuecomment-4279435

item.title: Tnt
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ok, I just wanted to verify that triston001 had the required number of hours, and boy did he ever:

$ ./stats.sh triston001 Stats for user: triston001 minutes logged in: 6117 (101 hours) (4 days) (0 weeks) (0 months) times logged in with forum password: 265 commands used: 315 private messages sent (includes /r): 106 private messages recieved (does not include /r): 17 chats sent: 9046 times others mentioned name in chat: 10 (commands used + chats sent) / minutes online: 1.53

I’m going to add everyone but kracky to the TNT group.

edit:
Tom_BETA and/or zuppers can add them to this group:
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=admin;area=membergroups;sa=members;group=87
Then my script won’t automatically run stats for them, and in the near future it will directly control TNT access via permissions.

edit2:
Right now there is a potential problem, make sure that none of them change their minecraft name, or the TNT-enabled account is up for grabs by anyone. When permissions are set directly by the forum this won’t be an issue, as it will be tied to the forum account.

TNT permissions added.

Read full topic
